resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82360</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82360</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4622</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Monitoring a Business</string>
            <string language="es">Supervisión de una empresa</string>
            <string language="ga">Monatóireacht ar Ghnó</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überwachung eines Geschäfts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Surveillance des affaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Monitorando um negócio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Verifica e Controllo un commercio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έλεγχος μιας επιχείρησης</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Factsheet outlining the various tools applied in measuring the health of a business, including(i) the Balance Sheet, (ii) Trading, Profit and Loss Account and (iii) Cash Flow Statement. Users of financial data and financial ratios are also examined with good worked examples shown.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja informativa que describe las diversas herramientas aplicadas para medir la salud de una empresa, se incluyen (i) Balance General, (ii) Cuenta de Pérdidas y Ganancias, y (iii) Estado de flujo de efectivo. También se examinan los usuarios de datos e ín</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog fírice a imlíníonn na huirlisí éagsúla a chuirtear i bhfeidhm a thomhaiseann sláinte an ghnó, lena n-áirítear (i) an Clár Comhardaithe, (ii) Cuntas Trádála, Brabúis agus Caillteanais agus (iii), Ráiteas Sreabhadh Airgid. Scrúdaítear úsáideoirí eola</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
            <string language="es">Empresariales. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Checkliste, welche die verschiedenen 
Hilfsmittel umreißt, traf bei der Messung die Gesundheit eines 
Geschäfts, including(i) die Bilanz zu, (ii) handelnd, Gewinn- und 
Verlustrechnung und (iii) Bargeldumlauf-Anweisung. Benutzer der 
finanziellen Daten und der finanziellen Verhältnisse werden auch mit 
den guten bearbeiteten gezeigten Beispielen überprüft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La fiche de données traçant les grandes lignes 
des divers outils s'est appliquée en mesurant la santé des affaires,
including(i) le bilan, (ii) commerçant, compte de pertes et profits 
des pertes et profits et (iii) rapport de marge brute 
d'autofinancement de financement. Des utilisateurs des données 
financières et des taux financiers sont également examinés avec de 
bons exemples travaillés montrés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O factsheet que esboça as várias ferramentas 
aplicou-se em medir a saúde de um negócio, um including(i) a folha 
de contrapeso, (ii) negociar, um cliente de lucro e de perda e (iii) 
uma indicação do fluxo de dinheiro. Os usuários de dados 
financeiros e de relações financeiras são examinados também com os
exemplos trabalhados bons mostrados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La scheda che descrive i vari strumenti si è 
applicata nella misurazione della salute di un commercio, including(i)
il bilancio, (ii) commerciale, profitti e perdite conto e (iii) 
istruzione di movimento di cassa. Gli utenti dei dati finanziari
e dei rapporti finanziari egualmente sono esaminati con i buoni esempi
funzionati indicati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενημερωτικό δελτίο τα διάφορα εργαλεία που 
εφαρμόζονται που περιγράφει στη μέτρηση της υγείας μιας 
επιχείρησης, συμπεριλαμβανομένου (ι) του ισολογισμού, (II) των 
εμπορικών συναλλαγών, του λογαριασμού αποτελεσμάτων χρήσης και 
(III) της δήλωσης ταμειακών ροών. Οι χρήστες των 
οικονομικών στοιχείων και των οικονομικών αναλογιών εξετάζονται 
επίσης τα καλά εργασμένα παραδείγματα που εμφανίζονται με.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
